org.apache.flink.runtime.instance

接口 SlotProvider

  • 所有已知实现类:
    Scheduler, SlotPool.ProviderAndOwner

    public interface SlotProvider
    The slot provider is responsible for preparing slots for ready-to-run tasks.

    It supports two allocating modes:

    • Immediate allocating: A request for a task slot immediately gets satisfied, we can call CompletableFuture.getNow(Object) to get the allocated slot.
    • Queued allocating: A request for a task slot is queued and returns a future that will be fulfilled as soon as a slot becomes available.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<SimpleSlot> allocateSlot(ScheduledUnit task, boolean allowQueued, java.util.Collection<TaskManagerLocation> preferredLocations)
      Allocating slot with specific requirement.

    • 方法详细资料

      • allocateSlot

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<SimpleSlot> allocateSlot(ScheduledUnit task,
                                                                boolean allowQueued,
                                                                java.util.Collection<TaskManagerLocation> preferredLocations)
        Allocating slot with specific requirement.
        参数:
        task - The task to allocate the slot for
        allowQueued - Whether allow the task be queued if we do not have enough resource
        preferredLocations - preferred locations for the slot allocation
        返回:
        The future of the allocation
